message.name: TARGET_POSITION_NED
message.description: This message encodes the position of a target object
message.field: X Position in NED frame in meters
Y Position in NED frame in meters
Z Position in NED frame in meters

message.name: TARGET_POSITION_NED_FILTERED
message.description: This message encodes the position of a target object
message.field: X Position in NED frame in meters
Y Position in NED frame in meters
Z Position in NED frame in meters
X Velocity in NED frame in meters/s
Y Velocity in NED frame in meters/s
Z Velocity in NED frame in meters/s
X Position variance in NED frame in meters^2
Y Position variance in NED frame in meters^2
Z Position variance in NED frame in meters^2
X Velocity variance in NED frame in (meters/s)^2
X Velocity variance in NED frame in (meters/s)^2
X Velocity variance in NED frame in (meters/s)^2
